JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description: - Experience (Fresher)- Experience with either Cake PHP Or any of PHP MVC framework.- Have a knowledge of Rest Api implementation.- Knowledge & experience of MySQL Database & No SQL database would be nice to have.- Knowledge of AWS services like Lambda, SQS, SNS, S3 buckets would be an advantage.- Must have an experience to work with Ajax, Node JS, Jquery, CSS, HTML.- Should be proficient in understanding code versioning tools such as Git.
